channel.title: Posts on Aditya Devaguptapu
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Aditya Devaguptapu

item.title: Hello there!
item.description: Hi First things first, A Happy new year! I figured I would make a resolution that could easily be fulfilled and voila!- this blog was formed! I have been meaning to move away from Wordpress and Tumblr because I wanted more control over my content without having to navigate through the maze of menus and plugins. To that end, I have been working on a nice side project - building a blog.
